thread.title: Fabulous find in NYC
thread.title_full: Fabulous find in NYC - Review of Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Rachel E
title: Fabulous find in NYC
text: Great hotel, wonderful staff, excellent location. The parking garage across the street was easy in and out...they were also very friendly and we waited less than five minutes for the car. The hotel room was quite large for NYC, and spotless. 11th floor was very quiet even though we faced 37th St. We will definitely stay there again!
